segments.text: I can't take my eyes off the window, where the garden outside looks so bright and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts sharply with the chaos unfolding in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman inside is in her own little world, polishing dishes while disaster looms around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Here I am, feeling a mix of admiration and frustration watching the children scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their excitement is contagious, but it’s laced with a tension that I can’t ignore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is almost bent in half, reaching deep into the cookie jar like it’s some treasure chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen if that stool tips over? It sends a shiver down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR
